name: BattleShip
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: battle ship
des:
Welcome to Battle Ship - the classic Naval warfare game!

Play against a relentless AI enemy that won't stop hunting you until your fleet is destroyed!

Command your crew with the coordinates to fire against and rid the sea of the hostile forces.

Earn your promotion through the ranks and compare your achievements with other Battle Ship players.

To play, take a look at your Tactical Grid and give your coordinates as "A4", "D2", etc. Keep track of your own fleet and make every shot count.

Happy hunting!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
